attributes.action: Stop Virgin Media from destroying the internet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are making a petition to stop Virgin Media Internet Ltd, Capping or limiting our Internet Service. If we pay for 10MB we expect to get 10MB not 1MB.
WE NEED TO TAKE ACTION ABOUT THIS NOW!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
